name: BIG Flat Calculator
description: Large numbers and large buttons, its Super Calculator BIG! Numbers on keyboard Visible = lighter and easier counting. Results screen can be scrolled thus you miss even one calculation. No complicated functions. Super BIG Calculator supports portrait or landscape mode for any phone or tablet. Stylish big keyboard for easy use.  Plus, minus, times, divided by equals and memory.What is needed more in life? No shrinking numbers or buttons only scroll the screen for the entire result!  Compatible with phone and tablet: Samsung  Motorola LG Huawei Sony and other
